titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: BREAST CANCER GRADE NOT KNOWN (PERCENTAGE OF DUCTAL CARCINOMA IN-SITU) - Description

div.p: BREAST CANCER GRADE NOT KNOWN (PERCENTAGE OF DUCTAL CARCINOMA IN-SITU) is the percentage of women diagnosed with breast cancer, where the BREAST BIOPSY REFERRAL OUTCOME National Code is 'Positive; i.e. cancer detected - non-invasive or possibly micro-invasive - grade not known (DCIS only detected)' or 'Positive; i.e. cancer detected - definitely micro-invasive - grade not known (DCIS only detected)'.
